lines.text:
[to the man who planted the bomb]
Mister, you picked a lousy time to die!

[the bomber has died]
If he sobers up, it won't be in this world... He's dead.

[the pilot has just landed the plane, and the bomb didn't go off]
Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to Denver. Altitude 5,300 feet above sea level... And thanks be to God for every foot of it.

[the captain is trying to decide which airport to land at]
I can't make L.A.
How about Las Vegas... I love gambling.
